job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical guidance.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how new features affect the broader business and technical landscape.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes the process of investigating, building initial versions, and choosing AI/ML technologies, which is core to modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the direct application and use of generative AI models, a key aspect of the 'Modeling' task for GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and exploring new technologies is a direct part of the modeling lifecycle.
This is a broad statement indicating involvement in the engineering of AI/ML software.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain supporting systems
job_tasks.justification: This covers the core software development lifecycle for building and maintaining systems that support AI/ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Creating technical documentation is a standard part of software development to ensure clarity and maintainability.
Working with APIs like GraphQL and REST is a fundamental software development task for integration.
These are tools used for containerization and orchestration, integral to deploying and managing software.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI/ML
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines is a key component of MLOps, ensuring data is ready for models.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes
job_tasks.justification: This directly addresses the improvement and establishment of operational workflows, a core MLOps function.
The mention of monitoring tools indicates a focus on maintaining and observing systems in production, a key MLOps concern.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data
job_tasks.justification: These are fundamental data preprocessing steps essential for preparing data for AI/ML tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain supporting systems
Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them.
Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design
Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and application of generative AI technologies such as LLMs, RAG, and agents, supported by frameworks like LangChain. It also requires software development skills to integrate these technologies into production systems, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
